thread.title: Will Smith Set to Perform at the Latin Grammys
thread.title_full: Will Smith Set to Perform at the Latin Grammys

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Will Smith Set to Perform at the Latin Grammys
text:
Comments Smith has said he is honored by the chance to perform at the forthcoming 16th annual Latin Grammy Awards to be held on November 19. 
It looks like Will Smith is making his return to music business in a big way. The 47-year-old actor has been set to perform at the upcoming Latin Grammy Awards. The upcoming annual Latin Grammys would be the 16th. It is set to be staged in Las Vegas on November 19 and aired on Univision from 8-11 p.m. ET/PT. Speaking of his upcoming gig, Smith was quoted as telling PEOPLE , "Performing at the Latin Grammy Awards is a huge honor for me." He then added, "I'll be surrounded by so many talented artists whose music has such profound global impact. I can't think of a more perfect place for Bomba Estereo and I to perform 'Fiesta Remix' for the first time onstage." Earlier this month, Smith released a collaboration with Colombian dance group, Bomba Estereo, on the band's Latin Grammy-nominated song "Fiesta". The collaboration marked his first music project since his 2005 album " Lost and Found ".
